ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- { 'client_id': attributes.headers['client_id'], 'X-Channel': attributes.headers['X-Channel'], 'X-Correlation-id': (if (isEmpty(attributes.headers['X-Correlation-id'])) correlationId else attributes.headers['X-Correlation-id'] ), 'X-Session': attributes.headers['X-Session'], 'X-User': attributes.headers['X-User'], 'X-Consumer': attributes.headers['X-Consumer'], 'X-Location': attributes.headers['X-Location'], 'X-Location-id': attributes.headers['X-Location-id'], 'X-Campaign-id': attributes.headers['X-Campaign-id'], (vars.additionalAttributes) }

%dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- { "X-Channel" : vars.inboundAttributes['X-Channel'], "X-Correlation-id" : vars.inboundAttributes['X-Correlation-id'], "X-Session" : vars.inboundAttributes['X-Session'], "X-User" : vars.inboundAttributes['X-User'], "X-Consumer" : vars.inboundAttributes['X-Consumer'], "X-Location" : vars.inboundAttributes['X-Location'], "X-Location-id" : vars.inboundAttributes['X-Location-id'], "X-Campaign-id" : vars.inboundAttributes['X-Campaign-id'] }

%dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- { dateTimeStamp: now() as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss" }, application: Mule::p('api.name'), (vars.inboundAttributes), message: vars.logMessage, processingStage: vars.processingStage, transactionStatus: vars.transactionStatus }

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- { 'code': (if (isEmpty(vars.httpStatus)) 200 else vars.httpStatus as Number), 'info': vars.transactionStatus, (if (vars.error == null) {'response-data': payload} else {'errors': vars.errors}) }

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- { 'code': payload.code, 'info': payload.info, (if (isEmpty(payload.errors)) {'response-data': vars.logMessage} else {'errors': payload.errors}) }

%dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- if (vars.errors == null) [ { errorCode: vars.httpStatus, shortDescription: if(vars.error.cause.message != null) vars.error.cause.message else "Generic Error", system: Mule::p('api.name'), severity: 'medium', source: vars.inboundAttributes['X-Channel'] } ] else vars.errors
